stringified:
To Snake Case | string | value | IMPLICIT | NONE
(string) =>
    string
      .replace(/([a-z])([A-Z])/g, "$1_$2")
      .replace(/\s+/g, "_")
      .toLowerCase()

original.description: Converts a string to snake case

string.description: String to convert to snake case

prompts: Transform string to snake case format
